page.title: 20THE D_PROJECT AT UPWOOD
page.content: This project was undertaken by the 3rd and 4th year children at Upwood County Primary School during the Summer Term, 1985. We made several visits to the village and to neighbouring farms. The people we interviewed were all extremely helpful and very interested in the idea of the topic. Children who lived in the village saw things and found out about things they had never even heard of! We have all thoroughly enjoyed the Domesday Project and hope that whoever is reading this in whatever year will find it all as interesting as we have. We don't know how you came to be reading this_perhaps your great grand_ parents told you about it. If so, that could be one of us_so look up the school records and find out! By Mr. J. Sockett
